mapper.insert: INSERT INTO challenge (sender_club_no, receiver_club_no, challenge_content, game_no, game_flag, club_ability) VALUES( #{sender_club_no}, #{receiver_club_no}, #{challenge_content}, #{game_no}, #{game_flag}, #{club_ability});
mapper.select: select ch.*, ga.game_date, ga.game_time, ga.game_addr from challenge ch inner join game ga on ch.game_no = ga.game_no where ch.receiver_club_no=#{no} order by ch.game_no desc;
select distinct ch.*, ga.game_date, ga.game_time, ga.game_addr from challenge ch inner join game ga on ch.game_no = ga.game_no where ch.sender_club_no=#{no} order by ch.game_no desc;
